announcement_body.headline: Dota 2 Update - August 8 2025
body: [p]Over the last few days we've addressed the following issues: [/p][p][/p][list][*][p]Ctrl+Alt pinging enemy abilities or items will now display that the ability or item could be on cooldown[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed an issue with quickbuy where, if a stackable item existed in inventory and another was marked for buy in quickbuy, the item would keep being bought as long as gold and stock were available[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed an issue where Quartero rewards could not be claimed[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed green range indicator appearing briefly when casting abilities with quickcast on press[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Mjollnir description stating that Chain Lightning deals bonus damage to illusions[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Alchemist losing bonus damage gained from granting scepter when dying[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed a bug where Bristleback's Seeing Red facet caused enemies in vision to disappear when the buff expired[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Dark Willow's Cursed Crown and Silencer's Last Word debuffs sometimes expiring without triggering[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed allies being able to target Dark Willow while she has Shadow Realm active[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Ember Spirit not getting remnant charges from allied hero kills when having the Aghanim's Shard[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Invoker's twister interval not matching twister radius[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Invoker's Tornado cast range being different than it's travel range[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed crash with Kez Katana bleed[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p]Fixed Kazurai Katana overhead damage numbers not representing spell amplification[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p]Fixed Kazurai Katana impale causing its non-damage effects to debuff immune targets[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Kazurai Katana shard lifesteal applying to triggered attacks[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Grappling Claw attacking targets outside of the melee buffer range when landing[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Grappling Claw being able to escape Kinetic Field[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Raptor Dance giving inconsistent amounts of invulnerability with cast speed bonuses[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Falcon Rush gaining rush speed incorrectly in some scenarios[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Shodo Sai Cancel sub-ability granting magic stick charges[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed a parry interaction that could cause Kez to Echo Slash into the 3rd dimension[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p]Fixed Lycan's Wolf Bite casting on allies that have disabled help[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Morphling being able to retain Necrophos Sadist stacks when morph ends[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p]Fixed Pugna being unable to use Magic Stick or Magic Wand while channeling[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p]Fixed Queen of Pain Bondage visual effects pointing towards enemies if they are invisible[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed a crash in Shadow Demon Demonic Purge[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Snapfire being unable to target ethereal units during Mortimer Kisses[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Tusk shards disappearing for all players when Tusk goes into snowball[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Weaver's bug bug where Hivemind XP was granted when a Swarm beetle attacked an allied hero[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Zeus +1 Heavenly Jump Target talent giving +2 attack speed slow[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed workshop tools not loading due to XML/CSS issues[/p][p]
